name: The ongoing pilgrimage to lightweight access to the Ethereum protocol
description: How can it be that the Ethereum protocol has been live for 8 years and we still don't have a solution lightweight protocol access?  In this talk you will learn why this is such a difficult problem and how we are finally approaching a real solution.

speakers.name: Piper Merriam
speakers.bio: Piper Merriam is a core developer contributing to research and design of the Ethereum Protocol.  His primary work focuses on lightweight access to the Ethereum protocol.
